lead_paragraph: Majlinda Kelmendi has advanced to the women's judo final at the Rio Games on Sunday, guaranteed of at least a silver medal and becoming the first athlete from Kosovo to win an Olympic medal.

headline.print_headline: Judo-Kelmendi Assured of Becoming First Kosovo Medallist
headline.main: Judo-Kelmendi Assured of Becoming First Kosovo Medallist

snippet: Majlinda Kelmendi has advanced to the women's judo final at the Rio Games on Sunday, guaranteed of at least a silver medal and becoming the first athlete from Kosovo to win an Olympic medal....
